---
title: Hex Sticker
---

```{r}
library(hexSticker)

sticker("logo-website.png", 
        package = "Tidy Finance", 
        p_size = 20, p_color = "black",
        s_x = 1, s_y = 0.75, s_width = 0.7, s_height = 0.7, asp = 0.9,
        h_color = "#3b9ab2",
        h_fill = "white",
        url = "tidy-finance.org",
        filename = "hex-sticker.png")
```
